author: Staff Reporter
text:
A woman threw her two-year-old son into a well and jumped into it atNagarkoodal on Tuesday. The deceased were identified as Ramya (21), wife of Veeramani, and their son Mouneshwaran.

According to the police, Ramya took the extreme step as she was upset over her husband’s addiction to liquor.
title: Woman throws son into well, ends life
